name: KHUSHI
briefDescription: a. To develop the scientific/fine arts/Literature/Sports and games activities among the members as well as general public.b. To keep unit and co-operation among the young mass of the locality.c. To spread and knowledge for cottage industries and other sources for self employment.d. To undertake relief measures in aid to distress people effected by natural calamities or in other ways.e. To educate the individual and the community to be aware of their problems and solve them with the resources available through their organized and collective action.
